name: Abbey - Fables Unfold
description:
In this story-driven visual novel, discover Abbey's past and fate through various encounters and biomes. As our submission for CGX Grad Jam 2020, we wanted to deliver a multiple choice light-hearted story set in a fantastic world. Thank you for checking it out!
